name: Huck Finch
tagline: Take Your Brand From Unknown to Unforgettable
description:
Huck Finch™ is an Ann Arbor-Based Studio run by Hien Lam and Matt Hansen specializing in Brand Strategy and Brand Positioning.
Through the power of shapes, colors, and lines, we invigorate businesses with enviable design & dynamic brand strategies to transform faceless businesses into meaningful brands that leave a lasting impression. 
When we partner with a brand, we help them uncover, define, and amplify their story and purpose. Through services such as brand strategy, brand identity development, logo design, and naming, we breath new life into your brand and make its story memorable. Because your brand deserves to be distinctive and recognizable.
Simply put, we launch brands that challenge what is and define what is to be.
READ MORE...
